name: nodejs-redmine-feedback
description: A easy feedback integration for any expressjs project. The module provides a simple POST http route that can be requested to create a new redmine ticket with the feedback message as ticket content

scripts.test: REDMINEURL=test.com REDMINEAUTHTOKEN=23323 REDMINETICKETPROJECTID=1 REDMINETICKETTRACKERID=1 REDMINETICKETSUBJECT=df REDMINETICKETPRIORITYID=1 mocha tests

author: Nicolas Traeder
